title: Ep 252 - Sleazy Spader Springtime 3: Tis The Sleazon - Speaking of Sex
content: Jon Cross is joined this week by Moe e from No-Budget Nightmares and Dee Shaw from 3 Black Geeks. These 3 intrepid sleaze-ologists wade through the choppy, filthy waters of 2001's sex farce, "comedy" Speaking of Sex from John McNaughton, the filmmaker who gave us Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer and Girls in Prison with Anne Heche and Ione Skye (that's real... look it up).  Starring James Spader, Bill Murray, Catherine O'Hara,
